text: The place is good for people who are looking for a place to stay the night and shower, which is ideal to me. The location isn't too far off, and the price I paid wasn't too expensive. It was clean enough and the lady at the front desk was really helpful and friendly. The only downside that I can think of is the shower stall was a bit stinky? It wasn't dirty or anything but there was definitely this weird smell to it. Other than that, the hairdryer doesn't work after certain hours, to not disturb the other customers I assume so better take note of that. Overall it's a great place to stay at.
One of the best hostels I've ever been to in Singapore. The bed is clean. Bathroom was okay. Staffs are helpful. I really like the kitchen/common room. Very comfy and cozy. Definitely gonna go back.

Solid value. The room was pretty classic hostel dorm style but I had no complaints. Everything was clean and usable, no bed bugs or mosquitoes. The wifi was okay as well. The location was close enough to some interesting shopping areas. I think the best part of this hostel is that the public lounge area is pretty comfy and clean.

You have to take stairs to the elevator which is kind of counterintuitive. Service is pretty good, usually run by teens so sometimes a bit misinformed but they try to be friendly. The dorm rooms were cramped and the top bed frame was loose so getting up was a bit of a hassle. The bathrooms were significantly more cramped. With all the cramped atmosphere sometimes it'd smell funky around but overall cleanliness was good. Breakfast is very simple bread or cereal basically. Location was great as you can walk around a lot of places.

Pro
Clean bunks with big locker spaces and space on the floor to go through your bags.
The kitchen and living space was very clean and comfy.
Breakfast is good, cereal, toast and spreads
Drinks provided too.
Close walk to bugis, lots of shops and food
Next to Arab food streets
Close to bus stops and stations

Con
The bathroom could be cleaner
If youâ€™re a female on a mixed floor you have to go to a female only floor to use the bathroom which is a bit annoying

Overall a great stay and would stay again
